@DanjelvdWal @Netlify Sounds like you might want a detailed conversation with that client about what they mean by "hosting". Netlify disrupts the traditional idea of origin servers since all hosting is direct from the CDN. But exotic setups for the build infra is possible. https://t.co/gpaOYHu02R
